profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.9 XObjects - 6.2.9.2 Reference XObjects
profile.description: A conforming file shall not contain any reference XObjects
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any reference XObjects

error.message: The document contains a reference XObject (Ref key in the form XObject dictionary)
